resources.string:
Serval Maps will store geographic location information locally, and will also broadcast it over the network. 

By continuing, you accept that this information will be broadcast. 

Serval has no long term repository storage of location details. 

Communications made using this software are not secure or private and data may also be witnessed by someone other than the intended recipient.
No map data files found. Do you wish to continue?
request information on available map data files
request and receive information about the available map data files
Serval Maps is running and collecting location information
